Package apps

Class StudentCourseRegistrationAndMarkEntryApplication

    Application class of the SCRAME system.

    • Constructor Detail

      • StudentCourseRegistrationAndMarkEntryApplication

        public StudentCourseRegistrationAndMarkEntryApplication()
        Constructor for a StudentCourseRegistrationAndMarkEntryApplication object. Based on the university setting, every StudentCourseRegistrationAndMarkEntryApplication object keeps track of three key objects, namely students, courses and professors.

    • Method Detail

      • main

        public static void main​(java.lang.String[] args)
        This is the main method to start the Student Course Registration and Mark Entry Application (SCRAME). The method first initialize a StudentCourseRegistrationAndMarkEntryApplication object using loadSCRAME() method. If the method return null object it means that there is no data or the data file has been corrupted. Otherwise, it will read from the data file and initialize system.

      • loadSCRAME

        public static StudentCourseRegistrationAndMarkEntryApplication loadSCRAME()
        The method is used to deserialize the state of the system.
        Returns:
        a StudentCourseRegistrationAndMarkEntryApplication object that is saved during the previous execution of the program, null if there is an IOException of ClassNotFoundException. This happens when the system binary file is corrupted or the structure of the program has been modified.

      • saveSCRAME

        public boolean saveSCRAME()
        The method is used to serialize the state of the system. The serialized object can be deserialized and loaded the next time SCRAME is started. This object is stored as the constant String filename, and can be used by other SCRAME applications.
        Returns:
        true if StudentCourseRegistrationAndMarkEntryApplication was saved successfully; false otherwise.

      • addStudent

        public boolean addStudent()
        This method is used to add a student to the students HashMap.
        Returns:
        false if student is already existing in the HashMap. true if the student object has been added to the students HashMap successfully.

      • addCourse

        public boolean addCourse()
        This method is used to add courses to the courses HashMap.

        The user will be first asked to enter name of the course. Followed by the name of the professor. Since there are in total 3 combination of courses:

        • Course with lectures only
        • Course with both lectures and tutorials
        • Course with lectures, tutorials and laboratories
        The user will be asked whether the course have tutorials first. If one course does not have tutorials, it will definitely not have labs. Similarly, the user will also be asked whether a course have laboratories.

        For each of the tutorial and laboratory, the user will be asked the number of groups in tutorial and laboratory sessions and the corresponding number of people in each group. For lecture, we assume there is only one lecture group for each course, which makes logical sense.

        Returns:
        true when course is successfully registered in the system, false when the course has already been added.

      • registerStudentForCourse

        public boolean registerStudentForCourse()
        This method is used to register a student in a course. Based on whether a course has tutorials or labs, the method will prompt user to enter the group number the student want to register (for tutorial and laboratories) By default, a student will always be registered to the lecture group, since every course has a lecture (by assumption).
        Returns:
        true if a student has successfully registered for a course, false if there is
        • No registered students in the system
        • No courses recorded in the system
        • Student does not exist in the system
        • Course does not exist in the system
        • Student already has registered course
        • Course has no more vacancies

      • checkAvailableSlotForCourse

        public boolean checkAvailableSlotForCourse()
        The method is used to print the slots of a course as specified by the user.
        Returns:
        false if either one of these conditions exist:
        • No courses available
        • Course does not exist
        true otherwise.

      • printStudentListForCourse

        public boolean printStudentListForCourse()
        The method is used to print the registered students of a course by lecture group, tutorial group or lab group.
        Returns:
        false if either one of these conditions exist:
        • No courses available
        • Course does not exist
        true otherwise.

      • enterCourseComponentsWeightage

        public boolean enterCourseComponentsWeightage()
        This method is used to enter the assessment weightage of a course. By assumption, all courses have 2 main assessment components: coursework and examination, and there are only 2 cases:
        • Coursework does not have subcomponents
        • Coursework has 2 or more subcomponents
        The user is first asked the weightage of examination, and coursework will naturally be 100 minus the weight of the examination. Then the user will be asked whether the coursework has/does not have subcomponents, and user will be prompt to under the weighage of each of the subcomponent.
        Returns:
        false if either one of these conditions exist:
        • No courses available
        • Course does not exist
        true otherwise.

      • enterCourseworkScore

        public boolean enterCourseworkScore()
        The method is used to enter the coursework score of a student. The method will iterate through all the students registered for a course, and prompt user to enter the raw coursework score if the coursework does not have subcomponent. In the case when coursework has subcomponents, the user will enter the raw subcomponent score one by one for each of the registered student. The method does not check whether a student has already has his coursework score entered. So each time the method is called, it will reenter the coursework score for all students. Such assumption is made since normally the mark will only be entered once, that is at the end of each semester.
        Returns:
        false if either one of these conditions exist:
        • No courses available
        • Course does not exist
        • Course component weightage has not been assigned
        true otherwise.

      • enterExamScore

        public boolean enterExamScore()
        The method is used to enter the examination score of a student. The method will iterate through all the students registered for a course, and prompt user to enter the raw examination score for a student. Similar to the enterCourseworkScore() method, this method does not check whether a student has already has his/her score recorded. This is based on the assumption that examination will only be entered once, that is at the end of each semester.
        Returns:
        false if either one of these conditions exist:
        • No courses available
        • Course does not exist
        • Course component weightage has not been assigned
        true otherwise.

      • printCourseStatistics

        public boolean printCourseStatistics()
        This method is used to print the statistics of a particular course. The method will only be able to run if all the students registered under a course have their scores entered.
        Returns:
        false if either one of these conditions exist:
        • No courses available
        • Course does not exist
        • Course component weightages have not been assigned
        • No students registered for course selected
        • Coursework scores have not been assigned
        • Exam scores have not been assigned
        true otherwise.

      • printStudentTranscript

        public boolean printStudentTranscript()
        This method is used to print the transcript of a selected student. For a student, this method will print all the courses he has registered and those that have all the marks entered.
        Returns:
        false if either one of these conditions exist:
        • No students available
        • Student does not exist
        true otherwise.

      • exitApplication

        public void exitApplication()
        This method causes the application to exit gracefully.

        This method prints a list of all students registed in the application.

      • printCourses

        public void printCourses()
        This method prints a list of all courses registed in the application.

        Returns:
        A valid string from the user.
